decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (263/012/001/A, 263/012/006/A, 263/012/002/A, 263/012/003/A, design and success statement. Received 06/06/2017. 263/012/004A/A, 263/012/005/A. Received 24/07/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The proposed new access to Star Road shall be used for emergencies exit purposes only.

Condition : 5 - No work shall start on the approved development until  the developer has secured arrangements to carry out landscaping of the area immediately outside the site adjacent to the access referred to in condition 4 and until the developer has submitted details of the proposed  landscaping  to and received approval of the same from the local planning authority..
description: Installation of a new single storey, modular building to function as a learning provision. Incorporating new partially covered soft play areas adjacent to the new building with free-standing external canopies to the rear and right elevation and cantilevered canopy to the front entrance.
